item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, all! I’m experienced Front-end Developer with more than 10 years in web development. Mainly focused in creating Mobile Apps (React Native), SPA (single page application) based on web technologies (javascript/html/css). Legacy projects but also acceptable for me. Regular work: currently working at one of the biggest E-commerce projects. Last project is: SPA for internal use. Used technologies and approaches: JavaScript (ES6), React as a View renderer, Redux as a mechanism for storing app’s state, Saga for asynchronous things, Immutable.
